saao/saa15/P334562
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}{d}UTU-EN-PAB lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia₂ DI-mu a-na {URU}de-ri DI-mu a-na {URU}HAL.ṢU is-su-ri LUGAL be-li₂ i-qab-bi ma-a ša LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} mi-i-nu ṭe₃-en-šu ina KUR-u₂ šu-u₂ x x x x x a-ki-ma a-ki-ma x x x x x x x-še x x x x x x x+x x x x x x in-ti-i-du x x x x x x ma-aʾ-da x x x x x x LUGAL BE-ia₂ x x x UD-mu an-ni-i x x x x+x lu-u₂ x x x x-nu e-pa-sa-an-ni x x x x+x-ni-a.a x x x x-a-te-e šu-nu ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni x x x x+x ina pa-na-te-šu-nu x x x x+x da-an-qa x x x-lu-tu 02 x x x e-pu-uš x x x x+x-a-ti
